live.name: (LIVE)
live.title: Shooting on model / Furniture
live.description: This intelligent studio system of 8m2 allows you to realize your photos and videos of live models or scenographies in a few minutes. Saved camera and light presets.

horizontal.name: (HORIZONTAL)
horizontal.title: Flat packshots
horizontal.description: Horizontal guarantees you the possibility of styling and photographing your products flat with the automatic removal of the background.

vertical.name: (VERTICAL)
vertical.title: Ghost
vertical.description: Give your product a 3D effect, choose the Ghost.

eclipse.name: (ECLIPSE)
eclipse.title: Accessories / Leather goods / Shoes / Sunglasses
eclipse.description: Designed for prop photography and video. Saved camera and light presets.

cyclorama.name: (CYCLORAMA)
cyclorama.title: Free production
cyclorama.description: Our 30mÂ² cyclorama allows you to mobilize a production team and take your photos and videos on an infinite white background.

postproduction.name: (POST PRODUCTION)
postproduction.title: Post production
postproduction.description: In addition to our photo and video shooting services on our machines, we offer retouching services with different packages according to your needs.
